Large open space that serves as the main common area for relaxation and gatherings, designed with Vastu principles in mind.
A dedicated home office space with sound insulation and minimal distractions, positioned according to Vastu for productivity.

Spacious balcony providing outdoor space and cross ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a dedicated balcony for relaxation and adherence to Vastu guidelines.
Commodious guest bedroom featuring an attached balcony.

openings.description: A centrally located staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor with safety railings and ample lighting.
Expansive balcony providing outdoor space and natural light for the master bedroom.

rooms.description: A flexible space that can be used as a studio or utility room, ensuring efficient use of available area.

openings.description: Access staircase connecting the first floor to the second floor with proper safety features.

vastu_considerations.directions: North-East for entry and living areas, ensuring natural light and energy flow.
vastu_considerations.alignment: Rooms are oriented to facilitate optimal circulation of air and light. Open spaces face the south-west as per Vastu guidelines.

irregular_plot_adaptation.description: The design incorporates flexible room boundaries and multi-functional spaces to accommodate the irregular shape of the plot while maintaining aesthetic integrity.
irregular_plot_adaptation.layout_strategy: Utilization of L-shaped corridors, asymmetrical layout with balanced distribution of rooms on different levels.

local_building_norms.compliance: The design adheres to local building norms and codes, including fire safety regulations and structural guidelines for multi-level dwellings.
local_building_norms.materials: Prefabricated and locally sourced materials are recommended for sustainable construction practices.
